statements: DELETE FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount > 50.00;
DELETE FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 101 AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000 OR (frequency = INTERVAL '1 month' AND last_payment_date IS NULL);
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 500 AND status = 'failed';
DELETE FROM recurring_payments WHERE user_id = 123 AND payment_frequency = 'monthly';
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE recurring_payment_id = 100 AND payment_date = '2021-12-01';
